body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Sweet Treats Bakery Customer Service. My name is Vincent Ramirez. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Vincent, my name is Beverly Taylor. I am very upset with the service I received at your bakery.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I am very sorry to hear that, Beverly. Could you please tell me more about the issue you encountered?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I ordered a custom cake for my daughter's birthday, and it was supposed to be ready by one p.m. yesterday. When I arrived to pick it up, it wasn't ready, and I had to wait for over an hour!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds very frustrating, Beverly. I apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you and your family. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the order number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Beverly. I am pulling up your order details now. While I do that, could you also confirm your phone number, just in case we need to follow up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five one two three four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Beverly. I have noted your concerns and will forward them to our management team. We will ensure that this does not happen again. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Vincent.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Beverly. Thank you for your time and for bringing this to our attention. Have a great day!
